location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: blueprint on paperDimensions: 980 x 1480mm, on sheet 1010 x 1490mm

mods.abstract: The map relates to letter No. 126 - S from the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf to the India Office dated 18 January 1947, with enclosure (folios 179-198).Map showing Hawar Islands and adjacent coast of Qatar.Red line around coast marked with reference points indicates recommended division of waters between Bahrain and Qatar.Marked on verso: 'Hawar'.Inscribed: 'Neg. No. 84/245/C'.
